summary: Two teenage assassins accept what they think will be a quick-and-easy job, until an unexpected target throws them off their plan.
cast: Saoirse Ronan|Alexis Bledel|James Gandolfini|Marianne Jean-Baptiste|Danny Trejo|Lynda Gravatt|Tatiana Maslany|Cody Horn|John Ventimiglia|Stu 'Large' Riley|Neville Archambault|Danny Hoch|Tuffy Questell|Nick Choksi|Gary Hope|Chris Colombo|Bettye Fletcher|Francesca Chaney|Morgan Demeola|Danielle DeSantis|Jeff Grossman|Cassidy Hinkle|Jeffrey M. Marchetti|Ismaelpeter Casillas Nelson|Leif Riddell|Paul Thornton|Vesta Tuckute|Uzimann|Emerald-Angel Young
title: Violet & Daisy
